ygData.subject: A New Faerie is Born?
ygData.msgSnippet: I took the plunge and created a new character on RN this evening. My new High Elf Cleric, Kythwin began his existence in that hellhole of a zone known as the
ygData.messageBody:
I took the plunge and created a new character on RN this evening. My new
High Elf Cleric, Kythwin began his existence in that hellhole of a zone
known as the Greater Faydark (dark, no loot, too many people and all
that infernal shouting!). After a couple of hours, I had him up to 3rd
level and it was off to Freeport, a place I find much more congenial. I
guess you could say that Kyth is like most gay men, began life in
someplace dim and depressing but took off at the first opportunity for
the big bright city!! Now I hope to make contact with someone from
Mystic Alliance and join up as soon as possible...I will be keeping my
eyes open as I bash those ugly orcs over the head and hope to see
someone soon.

Vince
Kythwin, Cleric of the Tunare, 3rd Circle
